question: Who among the following personalities associated with the formation of Bombay Presidency Association (1885)?
explanation: The Bombay Presidency Association was formed by Badruddin Tyabji, Pherozshah Mehta and Kashinath Trimbak Telang in 1885. It\'s an association that defended Indian interests and hosted the first meeting of the Indian National Congress (INC) in Bombay at the end of 1885.
